# P256.KeyAgreement.PublicKey.HPKEEphemeralPrivateKey

**Type Alias**

The type of the ephemeral private key associated with this public key.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias HPKEEphemeralPrivateKey = P256.KeyAgreement.PrivateKey
```
